original_title: The Clash: Tory Crimes and Other Tales
overview: For the first time on DVD, Terry Chimes fills in the story of the birth of punk. Essential viewing for every Clash fan, this incisive film features long-serving road manager and author Johnny Green who reveals the philosophy and the spirit which drove the band. Drawing on extensive footage of the Clash in performance as well as previously unseen drawings and cartoons by the legendary Ray Lowry, this is as close as youÂ¹ll ever get to being there.
title: The Clash: Tory Crimes and Other Tales
